2132.subject: MAND
2132.descrlong: Alternative assessment for the third semester of Mandarin. Freshmen and sophomore transfers attempting to satisfy the Language Proficiency Requirement through assessment must enroll in MAND 101, 102, 201, and 202 concurrently, except for international students who may enroll only in MAND 202. Junior and senior transfers attempting to satisfy the Language Proficiency Requirement through assessment, must enroll in MAND 101, 102, and 201, except for international students who may enroll only in MAND 201 or 202.
